++ Recipe Waffles



+++ EQUIPMENT

  * Large mixing bowl
  
  * Wooden mixing spoon
  
  * Measuring Cup
  
  * Measuring Tablespoon


+++ INGREDIENTS


    * 2 cups of all-purpose flour

    * 2 cups milk (thinnner?)

    * 4 tbspn Vegetable oil

    * 2 teaspoons of baking powder

    1 teaspoon of pure vanilla extract

    1 pinch of salt


+++ INSTRUCTIONS

  * Combine "Part 1"
  
  * Add butter until it resembles corn meal
  
  * Add water
  
  * Add to Waffle Iron
